journal-title-group.journal-title: Method & Theory in the Study of Religion

subj-group.subject: Special Feature on Manuel Vásquez's "More than Belief"

title-group.article-title: Work at the Limits: A Response to My Critics

abstract.p: This essay is a response to Paul Harvey's, Sylvester Johnson's, Kathryn Lofton's, and Jennifer Scheper Hughes's readings of More than Belief (2011).
